channel.description: Resources Slides Install Additional Applications from Ubuntu Use Synaptic for More Advanced Software Management from Ubuntu Apt-Get How To from Ubuntu How Software Installation & Package Managers Work on Linux from How-To Geek Snaps from Snapcraft.io Introduction to Snaps from Ubuntu Tutorials Video Script Letâ€™s take a look at installing software on Ubuntu Linux.
